ValidationRule.description: Email address suffix must be either @auspost.com.au or @apgteam.com.au
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(ISBLANK(IncentCredential__c)) && NOT( OR(
CONTAINS(LOWER(IncentCredential__c), '@apgteam.com.au'),
CONTAINS(LOWER(IncentCredential__c), '@auspost.com.au'),
CONTAINS(LOWER(IncentCredential__c), '@test.npe.apgteam.com.au') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure email address for Incent Credential is either @auspost.com.au or @apgteam.com.au.
